column2: SQL select query - supported query types
column6: select foo_bar from table where foo = "baz" and bar = "qux"
column11: select foo_bar_qux from baz where qux = "/^[l1][e3][e3][t7]$/i"

column2: SQL update query - update a records field
column3: update table foo set bar = "qux" where baz = "foo"

column2: SQL delete query - delete records from tables
column4: delete from foo where baz = "bar" and qux = 0

column2: describe the database table from it's descriptor
copy a table or entire database
delete a table or entire database - this process is irreversible
truncate a table removing all data except descriptor
